one_reviews_text: Crashes as soon as you click the start button to start scanning
review_feedback: We appreciate you taking the time to write a review. This isn't an issue we've had reported by anyone else so please reach out to us at support@ndreams.com so we can look into this for you.

one_reviews_text: Whole family loves this game, work a minimum wage job and sacrifice your characters safety fighting fruits! .

I love light gun games at the arcade. This plays like a light gun game but better in VR. Good graphics, fun guns, crazy fruit enemies. Super satisfying when fruit goes splat. The weapons are lots of fun to shoot.  

This is a good family game. I highly recommend it.
Stuck in the lobby, lever to start work does not appear. I followed all the pink arrows, and uninstalled and reinstalled the game.
review_feedback: Thanks for providing us with feedback about your experience and we're sorry to hear about your issue. Please be sure to reach out to us so we can look into this for you: support@ndreams.com

one_reviews_text: This is a very nice game one of the best i have played in vr for now
No sound in the game, the game not interesting like advertising
review_feedback: Hi Sameh, Shoot us an email at support@ndreams.com and I'll troubleshoot it for you :) -Daniel

one_reviews_text: The voice acting makes this better than it should be. Good gameplay, graphics, etc.
review_feedback: Glad to hear you enjoyed it Dizzy!

review_title: Fun and well made game - hillarious!
one_reviews_text:
Another game with funny narration, sounds like the old slug lady from Monsters Inc.

Shoot fruit, get points, new levels, multiple game modes, bonuses, lots of guns, change their order, all sorts of good stuff. Plus you can pull the pin on grenades with your mouth! such a good idea!

Graphics are cartoonish but very fun to interact with. I had no idea I would panic so much playing a grocery based game haha!

looks like a great game however I seem to be having problems getting the sound to work though the Oculus Rift headset for this game.

update:
This game is really fun even thou I am still unable to get the sound to work thou the Rift headset instead of my PC speakers.
review_feedback:
Hi Coillingclover! That doesn't sound good to us. Shoot us an email at support@ndreams.com and I'll troubleshoot it for you :)

-Daniel

one_reviews_text: Really good gameplay and graphics. Super fun. I didnt know that packing groceries and being attacked by killer fruit could be this much fun!
review_feedback:
Hey Roonay
So happy to hear that you love blasting fruit as much as we do!

review_title: Great VR demo, with a few downsides
one_reviews_text:
Pros:
-Lots of guns with a customizable loadout
-Lots of levels with 3-4 different "jobs"
-Nice visuals and sound that fit the game
-Unique mashup of genres "job sim" meets "waveshooter"

Cons
-Gets repetitive if trying to get the achievements, and especially if trying to do the marathon ones (30+ minutes each)
-Having to watch the job sim, watch the enemies, and watch the weapon line makes the game frantic to the point of being frustrating
-Some crashes, might not entirely be the game's fault but not sure

Overall I'd give this 3.5 stars.  It is a great game to show someone new to VR, because it is a lot of fun for 15-30 minutes at a time and very intuitive controls.  But as a long-term game to play regularly, harder to recommend.  While I applaud the creatively of the genre mash-up, I didn't really enjoy the job-sim part myself.
great shooter fun, looking good, there is nothig else to say! awesome game!!!
I enjoyed this game alot , the concept of having to unlock weapons via scanning items and there being a variety of types of levels led me to loving this game.

Cool concept, scan/pack items to unlock better fire power to kill the onslaught of out of control fruit trying to attack your work station!  Of all the VR games I own, I come back to this one the most!

The only VR game my wife and mother gets into! This is well polished and a blast to play! The trailer does not do this game justice (like most VR games).  A fun shooter that is accessible to everyone. Give it a go!

Such a cute, lovely polished wave shooter with a citrus twist! My biggest grape is that the difficulty in the marathons escalate stupidly slow, so you simply lose focus due to boredom after an hour or so and make stupid mistakes.
Picked this up yesterday, enjoying it a lot. Hope to see more from this studio!

This game beautifully blends facepaced novelty games like Cooking Fever with zombie horde wave survival.  I get bored pretty quickly with either of those genres individually, but when you combine the two its perfect.  I highly recommend this game to anyone who enjoys shooters with a twist.
Just the little touch of shooting and miniguns ;) awesome

review_title: Most fun ive had in VR
one_reviews_text: I have over 30 VR games, this one takes the cake as one of the funnest. Its definitly worth the money for how well the game is made and mechanics work beautiful as well.

Really fun multitasking game. Scan items and shoot invading fruit. Unlock weapons as you go and try to score three stars on each level. The difficulty progresses with the game which is good. Solid game!

This game has given hours of entertainment, and will continue to do so once the "Marathon Challenge" is unlocked. The loadout of weapons importance to each mission is just right and completing levels is really involving having to perform so many tasks at the same time. Complicated at times, but never loses the fun factor.
This is a really fun game.
Is it really so hard to NOT stubbornly use the operating system language and instead let the user chose? This game does not respect the language setting of Oculus Home.
review_feedback: Thank you for letting us know about your experience. You should be able to change the language within the game, so please be sure to reach out to us so we can look at this for you. You can email us on support@ndreams.com

one_reviews_text: Absolutley fantastic, very well thought out and loads of fun!!!!
Enjoying the game quite a bit. Just when you think it's getting a bit repetitive or boring they throw in a new wrinkle, be it a new task or new enemy. It's been a blast!
store simulation and shooting simulation
Fun game with replayability, graphics look good And the guns feel so good got me smilin' all the way
